sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Paper, Typography, Box, List, ListItem, ListItemText } from '@mui/material'; const palette = { rose: '#E7CCCC', sand: '#EDE8DC', leaf: '#A5B68D', mint: '#C1CFA1', }; const About: React.FC = () => { return ( {/* Gradient header like Categories/Questions/Rankings */} HakkÄ±mÄ±zda Ä°ngilizceye hazÄ±rlÄ±kta yalÄ±n, modern ve hÄ±zlÄ± bir deneyim {/* Features section - frosted card */} Ã–ne Ã‡Ä±kanlar {/* Stats grid */} {[ { value: '500+', label: 'Aktif KullanÄ±cÄ±' }, { value: '1000+', label: 'Soru BankasÄ±' }, { value: '4', label: 'SÄ±nav Seviyesi' }, { value: '2025', label: 'GÃ¼ncel Ä°Ã§erik' }, ].map((s) => ( {s.value} {s.label} ))} {/* Technologies */} Teknolojiler React TypeScript Node.js Material UI MySQL Database {/* CTA Buttons removed */} ); }; export default About;
